languages.text: Лошади со странным любопытством косятся на вас. Одна тянет морду ближе и щелкает зубами — слишком жадно и голодно для безобидного травоядного.
The horses glance at you with an odd curiosity. One of them pulls its muzzle closer and clacks its teeth — almost too greedily and hungrily for a harmless herbivore.
languages.original_text: Лошади со странным любопытством косятся на вас. Одна тянет морду ближе и щелкает зубами — слишком жадно и голодно для безобидного травоядного.

traits.locale_text: The horses glance at you sideways with an odd curiosity. One pulls its muddle closer and clacks its teeth, which are sharp and quite unlike a herbivore's.
The horses glance at you sideways with an odd curiosity. One pulls its muddle closer and clacks its teeth, which are sharp and quite unlike a herbivore's.
The horses glance at you with an odd curiosity. One of them pulls its muzzle closer and clacks its teeth. They are sharp, quite unlike those of a normal herbivore.
The horses glance at you with an odd curiosity. One of them pulls its muzzle closer and clacks its teeth. They are sharp, quite unlike those of a normal herbivore.
The horses glance at you with an odd curiosity. One of them pulls its muzzle closer and clacks its teeth — almost too greedily and hungrily for a harmless herbivore.
The horses glance at you with an odd curiosity. One of them pulls its muzzle closer and clacks its teeth — almost too greedily and hungrily for a harmless herbivore.

languages.text: 馬たちは、どこか奇妙な好奇心を込めてこちらを見つめてくる。そのうちの一頭が鼻先をぐっと近づけ、歯をカチカチと鳴らした。とても草食動物とは思えないほど、貪欲で飢えたような仕草だった。
languages.original_text: The horses glance at you with an odd curiosity. One of them pulls its muzzle closer and clacks its teeth — almost too greedily and hungrily for a harmless herbivore.

traits.locale_text: 馬たちは、どこか奇妙な好奇心を込めてこちらを見つめてくる。そのうちの一頭が鼻先をぐっと近づけ、歯をカチカチと鳴らした。とても草食動物とは思えないほど、貪欲で飢えたような仕草だった。

languages.text: Atlar, tuhaf bir merakla sana bakıyor. Biri burnunu yaklaştırıp dişlerini takırdatıyor. Zararsız, otçul bir hayvana göre biraz fazla açgözlü ve iştahlı duruyor.
languages.original_text: The horses glance at you with an odd curiosity. One of them pulls its muzzle closer and clacks its teeth — almost too greedily and hungrily for a harmless herbivore.

traits.locale_text: Atlar tuhaf bir merakla sana bakıyor. Biri burnunu yaklaştırıp dişlerini takırdatıyor. Zararsız, otçul hayvana göre biraz fazla açgözlü ve iştahlı duruyor.

languages.text: Los caballos te miran con una curiosidad atípica. Uno de ellos acerca su hocico y chasquea los dientes... con demasiada ansia y demasiada hambre para un simple herbívoro.
languages.original_text: The horses glance at you with an odd curiosity. One of them pulls its muzzle closer and clacks its teeth — almost too greedily and hungrily for a harmless herbivore.

traits.locale_text: Los caballos te miran con una curiosidad atípica. Uno de ellos acerca su hocico y chasquea los dientes... con demasiada ansia y demasiada hambre para un simple herbívoro.

languages.text: 所有的马都在看着你，视线中带着古怪的好奇。其中一匹马把嘴靠了过来，磨起了牙。这匹马望向你的目光充满了饥饿与贪婪，它恐怕已经不再是什么人畜无害的食草动物了。
languages.original_text: The horses glance at you with an odd curiosity. One of them pulls its muzzle closer and clacks its teeth — almost too greedily and hungrily for a harmless herbivore.

traits.locale_text: 所有的马都在看着你，视线中带着古怪的好奇。其中一匹马把嘴靠了过来，磨起了牙。这匹马望向你的目光充满了饥饿与贪婪，它恐怕已经不再是什么人畜无害的食草动物了。

languages.text: Les chevaux vous regardent avec une curiosité malsaine. L'un d'entre eux approche son museau et claque des dents, d'un mouvement un peu trop avide et carnassier pour un herbivore inoffensif.
languages.original_text: The horses glance at you with an odd curiosity. One of them pulls its muzzle closer and clacks its teeth — almost too greedily and hungrily for a harmless herbivore.

traits.locale_text: Les chevaux vous regardent avec une curiosité malsaine. L'un d'entre eux approche son museau et claque des dents, d'un mouvement un peu trop avide et carnassier pour un herbivore inoffensif.

languages.text: Die Pferde werfen dir einige neugierige Blicke zu. Eines von ihnen schnuppert an dir und klappert mit den Zähnen ... ein wenig zu hungrig und gierig für einen harmlosen Pflanzenfresser.
languages.original_text: The horses glance at you with an odd curiosity. One of them pulls its muzzle closer and clacks its teeth — almost too greedily and hungrily for a harmless herbivore.

traits.locale_text: Die Pferde werfen dir einige neugierige Blicke zu. Eines von ihnen schnuppert an dir und klappert mit den Zähnen ... ein wenig zu hungrig und gierig für einen harmlosen Pflanzenfresser.
